news.title: Jim Cramer explains why you should look toward more cult stocks in 2025
news.content: CNBC's Jim Cramer on Monday said that the fundamentals can sometimes hold investors back from buying stocks that, in hindsight, are obvious success stories.

news.title: TradePulse Power Inflow Alert: Tesla Inc.  ( TSLA )  Receives Alert And Climbs 3.6% On The Day - Tesla  ( NASDAQ:TSLA )
news.content: TSLA CLOSES AT THE HIGH OF THE DAY UP OVER 16 POINTS AFTER ALERT Tesla, Inc. TSLA today experienced a Power Inflow, a significant event for those who follow where smart money goes and value order flow analytics in their trading decisions.

news.title: Why Tesla Stock Jumped Again Today
news.content: Tesla ( NASDAQ: TSLA ) stock has seemingly gone straight up since the U.S. election. That more than 80% rise has brought it to new all-time highs. Shares jumped another 5.6% today as of 3:25 p.m. ET. And one Wall Street analyst thinks there are good reasons for the recent parabolic move.Wedbush ...

news.title: Google's Generational Breakout  ( 5 New Catalysts )
news.content: Google is one of the most dominant and innovative tech companies worldwide. Though the company owns the legacy search market, inroads into new and explosive growth industries should excite investors into 2025 and beyond.

news.title: What's Going On With Rivian  ( RIVN )  Stock? - Rivian Automotive  ( NASDAQ:RIVN )
news.content: Rivian Automotive Inc RIVN shares are trading higher by 6.68% to $15.33 during Monday's session. The stock has gained some 11% since last Wednesday's session after Benchmark analyst Mickey Legg initiated coverage with a Buy rating and an $18 price target.
